text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm kosel A Cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Sydney today
I'm going to show you how to turn on
functions procedures and triggers for an
Amazon RDS for MySQL DB instance let's
get
started as part of this process set log
bin trust function creators to true in
your parameter group you don't need
super user permissions to complete this
step let's begin after you sign in to
the AWS Management console navigate to
the Amazon RDS console next in the
navigation pen choose parameter group
and then choose create parameter group
enter a name for your new parameter
group then enter a
description choose the engine type MySQL
Community
Edition select the parameter group
family based on your DB instance version
I'm creating it for MySQL version 8
choose create to create the parameter
group now let's edit the
parameter select the custom parameter
group and then choose edit now enter log
bin trust function creators in the
filter parameter
Box by default this parameter is set to
zero select the value one and then
choose save
changes now that I have edited the
parameter I'm going to attach the custom
parameter group to the DB
instance open the Amazon RDS console and
then navigate to the databases select
the DB instance that you want to attach
the custom parameter group to choose
modify now scroll to the database
options and select the custom parameter
group scroll to the bottom and choose
continue on this page choose modify DB
instance
on the configuration tab you see that
the DB instance parameter group is in
applying status because it is
associating the new parameter group with
the DB instance after the custom
parameter group is applied the status
changes from applying to pending reput
because I need to reboot the DB instance
for the changes to take effect to reboot
the instance I will choose actions and
then reboot if this is a multi-az
deployment then make sure that you
reboot without fail over
after the reboot on the configuration
tab you see that the parameter group is
now in the insync
status if you're already using a custom
parameter group then edit the custom
parameter group just search for log bin
trust functions creators and select the
value one then choose save changes
because this is a dynamic parameter you
don't need to reboot the instance so now
you know how to turn on functions
procedures and triggers for an RDS mySQL
database instance
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
